name: Linguini With Oven-Dried Tomatoes, Grapes and Anchovies
keywords: fall, grape, linguine, tomato, main course, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 medium-size cloves garlic, peeled and minced
6 anchovy fillets, cut across into thin strips
2 cups rosemary-orange oven-dried tomatoes (see recipe), quartered
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add the linguini and cook until al dente, about 10 minutes. Drain and place in a large bowl. Add the garlic, anchovies, dried tomatoes, dried grapes and red pepper and toss well. Add the olive oil and salt and pepper to taste and toss. Divide among 4 plates and serve.
